data.title: Unlimited laser tag on wednesdays
data.text: This is my local bowling alley. My kids enjoy the unlimited laser tag on Wednesday night. I enjoy bowling and reminding myself how truly an awful bowler I am.  There are sometimes special group rates & coupons available. There is a bar, function room and you can have your food brought to you or you can buy it at the grill. If the kids aren't into laser tag or bowling there is a video arcade with machines that spew tickets for prizes.
